Name: Faith Ring
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Fighting-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Happiny, Chansey, and Blissey.  You can get a Faith Ring at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Blissey Song, a Blissey Card, and an Amity Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
